name: Erica Dantzler (Marshea)
text: They have such an amazing staff there. Time you walk through the doors they make you feel at home and very comfortable. The one that helped me was very encouraging and patient. But I promise you, you wouldn't believe your eyes when you see the miracle of their products on your body. You would be absolutely speechless!!! I promise, you WILL NOT be disappointed!!

name: L L T
text: Oh I love this, it is everything , EXCELLENT. I initially ordered a large but reconsidered, it was not giving the firmness. I exchanged for a small. So happy I did. I still have room to go to the last hook.Thank you so much for your consideration, patience, your excellent refund/return/exchange policy. I will recommend this garment to others and purchase another myself. Thank you so much and God bless you!

name: Tee whyte
text: For that Abdominoplasty too hold in you need two pieces. If you have two piece fats. Waste my money the make it seem so simple with no extra explanation.now im out of 120.00 with a no refund policy. Exchanged for a larger size still didn't help everything not for everybody.

name: Shamichaell Rembert
text: I've ordered several times with Weights N Lipstick, and have always been fully satisfied with my order. The quality of the trainers are by far the best I've ever purchased. They are very helpful and professional. My very first trainer was a 4x that I purchased over 2 years ago and now I just had to buy a new one because I'm down to a large. There products and trainers really work. They have earned a customer for life. I 100% recommend this company to anyone.

name: La Faye
text: Weights and Lipstick has the best customer service of any retailer that I have shopped with. The owners anticipate the needs of their customers and provide unmatched service. Their products are high quality and are definitely worthy of the investment. Overall I would recommend everyone to shop with them!

name: Shamika Ray
text: I purchased a waist trainer from Weights and Lipstick. I had an in person consultation/fitting. The products sold themselves! Le’Ron educated me on the product and how take care of it.  He was very knowledgeable of all of his products. Customer service was top notch. I will most definitely do business again and have recommended them to friends and family!

name: Heaven McGadney
text: I purchased from Weights and lipstick about 2 years ago and also last year. Both transactions were professional and overall positive! I purchased a waist trainer and it is so comfortable and easy to workout in. They make you feel comfortable and they value their customers more than anything! I will definitely continue to shop and support. 10/10 recommended!

name: Michelle Jackson
text: Shopped with them and they were excellent from beginning to end. They treated me with kindness and handled my problem areas like it didn't bother them. This made me feel comfortable showing my stomach which is hard to do. I would give the 10 stars if it was an option.

name: Kim Hall-Woods
text: Best place to go and get a waist trainer.  The customer service is amazing. Go there and get snatched and feel great when you're done. Thanks Weights N Lipstick for my amazing waist trainer.

name: Deborah Hendrix
text: Excellent Customer Service By Owners. Took Time To Make Sure That I Was Satisfied With Merchandise And Fit. Would Highly Recommend Them To Other's.

name: Leandrea Russell
text: I have placed several different orders and I am pleased each time. The shapewear and waist trainers are the best and I have tried dam near all of them. When weights n lipstick says it doesn’t roll or move, they didn’t lie. GET ON BOARD YOU WONT REGRET IT.

name: Lakesha Peters
text: I love their products! I purchased my waist trainer two years ago and got pregnant shortly after getting married with twins and I have used this waist trainer to help with pain and to keep things “together”. It definitely helps as an undergarment so that my clothes lay properly! HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM!

name: The Hardy Party
text: Very professional! Reply’s back in a timely manager. Great attitudes and very helpful. Open to answer any questions you have about the product. I will be going back cause my waist trainer is the best I’ve ever had.

name: Shenita McMillan
text: OMG I AM IN LOVE!!  I am on a weight loss journey and have lost 80pounds so far and was looking for good shape wear so I  ordered the Georgia Peach on February 19 or 20th and received it on February 23. I loved it so much I told my mom about it and she ordered one for herself and I just ordered 2 more products today and can't wait to get them. The products do everything they say they do. If you ordering I promise you will not be disappointed.

name: Carolyn Collins
text: I love these people. I bought a sweatshirt and flip flops still wearing it until this day. Great people and great atmosphere. Go shop with my people

name: Ashley Bridgewater
text:
Two amazing individuals who are letting their lights shine!

The quality of merchandise? Is just that, grade A quality!

What are you waiting for? Go ahead... No, really it is! They are legit!

Oh! And please, don’t forget to tell them, Ashley sent you!

name: Donna Moore
text:
I would like to say thank you to
Weighs N Lipstick for my high quality
waist trainer I’m so loving it,Now I know without a doubt with time, hard work ,and dedication I will be where I need to be in no time💪🏽 And may I add,Their Snatch Sauce Burn does just what it says it’s going to do Burn Calories🔥 so I thank you both.... Kenya and Ron

name: Jeanine Leland
text: Honeychild Weights and Lipstick was getting me fine fine with the snatch sauce and trainers. That's why I'm pregnant by my husband now🤣🤣my oops. They are so humble and sweet. Always welcoming and willing to put you in the best trainer for your body type.

name: Cindi
text: I don’t even know where to start with this brand... I was a non-believer that shareware is permanent I looked at it as a quick fix for a specific look... but OMG when I noticed the changes in body’s definition, then it’s comfortable, I wore it 8 hours and wasn’t uncomfortable at all... it didn’t roll down or up. The material is soooo durable It’s over a year old and still in tact. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND ANY WEIGHT N LIPSTICK PRODUCT‼️

name: Talinisia Rankin
text: I’ve ordered from them a few times very friendly atmosphere, they make you feel comfortable not only do they just sale products they have knowledge of what they’re selling will help you in any way they can for you to be successful. The products they sale are amazing I will be ordering again soon.

name: Ashley Dawson
text: Hands down THE BEST!!!! Great customer service from the booking process through fitting and even afterwards!!! Highly recommend for brides that want that perfect shape! I’m too excited!!

name: Lisa Knox
text: Luv, luv their products!! And they are wonderful people to purchase from! Weights N Lipstick have quality products and great customer service!

name: Neicey Young
text: Great products Ron is very professional and fitted me in my 5x waist trainer and now I’m in a xl if you remain consistent waist training does work

name: Zsaquez Thomas
text: I love their products they are very high-quality items, Leron and Kenya are professional yet personal when helping you decide which item is best for you to get the results you want.

name: Sharika Sykes
text: Over the last few months I’ve switched originally from a medium to an xxs in waist trainers!! I’ve purchased 4 and love them.

name: Kentrell Griffin
text: Very professional and knowledgeable! Their merchandise is excellent quality, and customer service is second to none

name: Carolyn Collins
text: I love my people.... shop weights n lipstick.... great customer service; and great people

name: April Hill-Coleman
text: Great personable experience. The owners are very professional and knowledgeable of their products.

name: Kerria Marie
text: I heard of Weights and Lipstick early last year and decided to give it a try. Girrrlll they do NOT disappoint! I did an in-person fitting at their Suffolk location. Once Kenya had me in, I looked like a whole new person. Their products really do speak for themselves. Watch their live fittings on Facebook if your not sold already. YOU WILL BE! I have ordered multiple products since from the abdominoplasty to the snatch sauce to the detox tea. They all work wonders. My husband even wears his hubby hugger and snatch sauce FAITHFULLY when he works out. Also, if your serious and committed give their 3 week coach class a try. I’ve lost more weight in a week and half then I’ve tried on my own in 3 months. Also, they’re shipping is really fast, I’ve got products as soon as 2 days! Not sure what size to order? Inbox them and they’ll give you specific directions on how to take the pictures they need to tell you what size to order. Not only is WNL professional but they are super helpful and welcoming.

name: Heather Mitchell
text: Best trainers ever. On my 2nd one. #3 coming soon ☺️

name: Genade Colley
text: A wonderful atmosphere to shop in and the owners are incredible! If you're needing your "gut" snatched they are the king and queen of snatching!

name: Vernon Collins
text: Very knowledgeable and helpful. Quickly fitted and great prices.

name: Keyannia Law
text: Both Kenya and Ron are super amazing I ordered a trainer and I received the wrong one Ron got me right the next day and resolved the issue I was really pleased and they were on vacation what that tell you shop weights & lipstick

name: Cori Sylvester
text: They are very professional and have awesome products.

name: Danielle Vines
text: Very professional , they know there stuff

name: Kippen Gallagher
text: Stacy is a wonderful artist potter. She is constantly evolving with her designs and her glaze work. She's a fascinating artist. Her work is a pleasure to have in my home and being used on a daily basis. From plates for my grandchild years ago to more recent mugs.

resp.text: Kipper, I appreciate that so much. Thank you. It’s been a pleasure getting to know you

name: Kitten Kaos
text:
I have taken two classes with Stacy at the Mill over this summer.

The Octopus class was incredibly detailed and amazingly cool. Nothing held back; Stacy is invested in her students having as much success as possible in the process. She was accommodating to my flight schedule and carry-on restrictions and worked with me on the things I could not bring on the plane. The class was fun and I got to meet and make new friends with a great bunch of clay folk. And, I made a crazy octopus bowl to boot!

Later in the summer, I was able to take another class, Slip Trailing, on my way to a work seminar. This was a tremendous compliment to the octopus work, and will have applications in a lot of my other work. It adds a dimension (literally) that is not available through glaze or underglaze. She was detailed enough in the chemistry that I was hooked, but not so much that the class was lost. The demos and slip play go a super long way in understanding the intricasies of the process.

Now to the area. Alabama is just lovely! The hot sticky weather that they were having was perfect for my cold northern blood. The flora in Alabama is completely different to mine, and I enjoyed driving around to take it all in. The Mills are an amazing space dedicated to the arts and I could have spent days wandering the booths. And!! Anyone visiting Stacy who is gluten free or paleo; I found the most delightful bakery and eatery. Their dedicated gluten free facility has some of the best stuff, and that includes BEFORE my diagnosis. Try the jalapeno cheddar scones at Mason Dixon Bakery, you’ll never want to leave.

So seriously, if the opportunity comes to have class with Stacy and S.P.Morgan Studios, take it; you will have no regrets.

name: Betsy
text: I have purchased several pieces from Stacy Morgan and every piece is as beautiful and well crafted as the last. The glazes and her techniques make each piece truly special whether it is functional like a great noodle bowl or decorative. Stacy responds quickly and is very helpful. I will keep ordering more.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Betsy! I appreciate your kind words and your support.

name: Kathryn Somers
text: I have taken 2 workshops from Stacy.  She is a wonderful instructor who is able to communicate and demonstrate effectively to her classes.   She is funny, passionate, curious and caring, thoughtful and a fountain of knowledge.   The facility at Lowe Mill in Huntsville is fantastic and her studio there is an artist's dream - open and full of light.    Her work is fully of whimsy and charm and is always flawless in its execution.   I am delighted to have a piece of her work and it makes me smile whenever I walk by it.

resp.text: Thanks, Kathryn! I hope we get to reconnect soon.

name: Cheryl Krebs
text: An incredibly talented potter with a ♡ of gold. I own a few of Stacy’s pieces and enjoy them even more each day. They are durable and SO FUN! I am also a potter so I have pretty high standards for skill and aesthetics... her pieces exceed the quality of most potters and the aesthetics speak for themselves. If you get a chance to meet Stacy... do it... then when you drink from one of her vessels you can think of her and enjoy the moment even more.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Cheryl. I learned by being a part of our community. <3

name: Daniela Perallon
text: I'm so picky about pottery, but Stacy's work is incredibly unique, hitting all the notes from moody and dark to bright and whimsical and everywhere in-between. She's always experimenting with new designs and techniques while maintaining top notch quality. I'm proud to own her artwork! We are running out of room on our mug shelf because we can't stop purchasing her mugs.

name: Kiley Salmon
text: I love every piece that I have from here. They are each so unique and beautiful. If you are like me and love the feel of textures on your hands you will love her work. I don't think that I truly ever appreciated the work that goes in to someone making coffee cups and vases but after touching my first cup and following her page I am always in awe of the things that she can make.

resp.text: Thank you! I appreciate the support.

name: SofaQueen OG
text: Her work is simply mesmerizing, the glaze work is the coolest I've ever seen. I had to get a purple squid mug and it's one of my absolute favorites.  Almost too pretty to use. I've gotten so many compliments on it and considering I've used it at least twice a week since last June, I think it's holding up well for hand made pottery. I look forward to expanding my collection.

name: Brittani Tkacz
text: Stacy Morgan is not only a talented artist, but an excellent business owner who communicates well and is extremely accommodating. I had several questions that she answered quickly, and she shipped my purchase quickly. Upon arrival, I was amazed to find the item I had purchased (one of her awesome frog mugs) was even more beautiful in person. The design is excellent too, as the handle is sooo comfy in my hand! I give SP Morgan Studio my highest recommendation!

resp.text: Thank you, Brittani!

name: Deacon Wolfwood
text: Great shop! Full of wonderful pottery for sale, the owner is super friendly, full of wonderful knowledge, and open for custom orders. Mrs. Morgan has a great idea for detail, has amazing glaze techniques, and some beautifully unique pieces, you simply MUST SEE! 10/10 WILL VISIT AGAIN.  She also has an online shop that is Mobile optimized 💛

name: Daniel Ruiz
text: Simply some of the most amazing functional ceramic art I've ever seen. Stacy's a great person and teacher as well. Visit her, buy some of her stuff. You'll be forever grateful. Makes great gifts too!

resp.text: Thanks so much, Daniel!

name: Lisa Andrew
text: I have been an admirer of Stacy Morgan's beautiful unique pottery for a while, so I jumped on the chance to take one of her workshops.  What a fun, outstanding learning experience.  Stacy is not only a talented artist, but also a skilled communicator and teacher.  I enthusiasically recommend her workshops.  When I can't make it to her studio in person, I keep an eye on her website and jump at the chance to add another piece to my collection.

name: Maria Hathcock
text: Stacy is one of the most creative people I know. After falling in love with her techniques at creating her octopus pieces I decided to make the long trek from Texas to her studio at Lowe Mill in Huntsville, Alabama. Not only did I learn all about how to make pieces with her techniques we also quickly became friends. Her easy manner and southern hospitality were endearing and welcoming. We planned a second trip out with the original group we had but were very disappointed to have to reschedule due to Covid-19. It’s been the highlight of my year to return and take more classes with Stacy.

resp.text: Thank you, Laura. I am holding high hopes we get to have our reunion this fall and I am so looking forward to seeing you all again.

name: Mark Campbell
text: Stacy is a very talented potter and a great person.  Her work is thought provoking and beautiful.  I like that she steps out of normal boundaries. I would recommend her work to anybody.

resp.text: Thank you, Mark!

name: Barbara Russell
text: Ordered a lil mug online & it arrived super fast & very well packed. Craftsmanship is excellent. Texture is silky, mug is lightweight but sturdy. Beautiful & exactly as pictured. Thank you so much Stacy! I'll continue collecting your pieces.

resp.text: Thank you Barbara, for your kind words and continued support.

name: Lisa Malone
text: I am privileged to own several of Stacy’s pieces; each is lovely and unique. When I have ordered online with shipping the pieces have been carefully packed and arrived safely. If you are looking for some amazing art, you’re in the right place!

resp.text: Thank you, Lisa! I so appreciate your support...you’ve been with me since day one and I am forever grateful.

name: Amanda Conger
text: Stacy's mugs are my handsdown favorites. They are a generous size but not to heavy/bulky to hold with a perfect little thumb spot and gorgeous designs. Whenever we open the cupboard, they are the first mugs everyone makes a beeline for. They wash in the dishwasher (nothing fussy) and have held up wonderfully.

resp.text: Thanks, Amanda. There is no finer compliment to a potter than to know their work is being used and loved regularly!

name: Joseph Bott
text: I have dealt with Stacy at S.P Morgan Studio many times. Her work and business are both amazing and respectful. She works hard to treat customers with care and always has a smile on her face. Without a doubt, one of the best pottery people in the business.

name: Dave Edens
text: When visiting Lowe Mill Stacy's studio is always a must stop. On top of the amazing finished works on display, it is a working pottery studio and you can see her at her craft pretty much most of the time. I have a couple of her pieces and they are both wonderful and functional.

resp.text: Thank you, Dave! Always a pleasure to see you!

name: William Wolf
text: Stacy's artwork is sublime. From the everyday objects like mugs and plates, to the fantastic sculptures of sea creatures and fae beings, everything is beautiful, functional, and most of all filled with her love of her art. I would recommend getting your hands on some of it as soon (and as often) as possible.

resp.text: Thank you, William!

name: gail armand
text: Some of my favorite pottery ever. It is in my personal collection and is one of my favorite things to give people I love. Highly distinctive. I would recognize SP Morgan anywhere, including the Smithsonian. Yes, it is that good.

name: Yvonne Castillo
text: Stacy’s art work is stunning with gorgeous details. I’ve had the pleasure of taking classes from her and learned even more than the class was about. Stacy is always makes sure you understand the reason behind the process as well as the process of the class material. I definitely recommend her classes and beautiful art.

name: Darlena Dettmer
text: I absolutely LOVE this place! Each piece is carefully handcrafted with unique detail and made with the finest of quality! I would give S.P. Morgan Studio more than 5 stars if Google had it.

resp.text: Thank you, Darlena!

name: Jules W
text: I love S.P. Morgan's pottery. I love her creative side along with great quality of mugs, bowls and vases. I live out of state and have never had a problem with receiving my items through shipping.

resp.text: Thank you so much. I try my best

name: OkRandom Art
text: Stacey is a prime example of why I work with local artisans. Every time I pick up a piece of her work I learn something new about her process. The transaction is more personal...it comes with a story...and her work is simply stunning . You will not find these things in a department store. Highly recommended.

name: Heidi See
text: I ordered a cup from Stacy. It came really fast. It was packaged very securely the mug arrived in perfect condition and was exactly what i wanted. She even sent me an extra surprise with it. Thank you so much

name: Helen Lien
text: I have purchased several pieces from Stacey for both myself and as gifts. I could not be more satisfied with each and every purchase. Her designs are creative, unique, and well-executed. Be sure to follow her on Facebook to see her latest glaze experiments and works in progress.

name: Robin Lucas
text: I’ve not only purchased Stacy’s fabulous work, but I’ve taken a workshop as well.  She’s a great teacher and the passion in her work shows in every piece she makes.  I’ve been won over as a fan for life!

resp.text: Thanks, Robin!

name: Elizabeth Lobdell
text: I bought 2 lovely mugs from SP Morgan as gifts. I shamelessly kept them and found something else to give. I absolutely love the way they feel in my hand.

name: Tonya Sitko
text: Stacy’s art is amazing. As an example, her octopus bowls and tentacles are simply extraordinary. Highly recommend.

name: Diahn Ott
text: I’m honored to not only own two of Stacy’s pieces, but to have taken a fantastic workshop on slip-trailing with her. She is a truly wonderful teacher, an inspired artist, and I look forward to a time when I can collect some more of her work and take another class.

resp.text: Thank you, Diahn!

name: Kathryn Phelan
text: Love my mug. The textural details and colors are wonderful. The handle and lip edge are very comfortable.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Ronda Bynon
text: Ms. Morgan's potter has a unique quality that makes me keep coming back to purchase something new.  She is also extremely knowledgeable about her art and willing to share that knowledge.

name: Miki Bowman
text: I have a few pieces of her work and I've drooled over many more! Her style is unmistakable and pulls at my heart. Plus, her dog is freakin' awesome.

resp.text: Ha! Thank you! And Whiskey says hello!

name: Susan Burlingame
text: Took a workshop with Stacy. She is generous with her information and process.  A really nice person too.

resp.text: Thank you, Susan!

name: j cole
text: Some of the most beautifully crafted pottery I have ever seen! The octopus pieces are so delicately sculpted and are so incredible!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: V Wyatt
text: I call it my "Tuesday mug," and have been using it most Tuesdays for at least a couple of years. It has been in the dishwasher and the microwave countless times, and so faithfully continues to bring me visual delight as I trundle through my day.

resp.text: That’ll make a potter smile....love hearing that my work is holding up well to real use!! Thank you!

name: Denise Joyal
text: Wonderfully talented artist. A must-have for your ceramics collection!

resp.text: Denise, I so appreciate the kind words! Thank you.

name: Jeanna Wing
text: This studio has some amazing, original work! Wonderful person, great atmosphere!

name: Brenda Armistead
text: Absolutely LOVE this artist's studio.  Wonderful work, great atmosphere.

name: Rebekah Krieger
text: I love my little cup, it’s well made and arrived quickly!

name: Joanie Nash
text: Stacy is a wonderful teacher. Thank you for everything you do and share.

resp.text: Thank you, Joanie!

name: Rebecca Ziemer
text: Stacy is AWESOME!!!!! Great personality, flawless products, and entertaining as heck.

resp.text: Thanks, Rebecca!

name: ambi dreamt
text: Talented artist & potter living her dream, with a gleam in her eye & a wit to her banter.  Check out her craft!

resp.text: Thank you, Jennifer!

name: Kris Gibson
text: Amazing pottery!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kris!
